thread.title: Mike
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text: Easy to use. The links to the chapters were helpful. Gave me just what I needed to refresh my driving knowledge and avoid mistakes on the road. Great reminders about the responsibility of drivers. Cost is affordable and liked that I got email updates when the court reviewed my completion certificate.
